channel.title: Flutter on ALiAS Writes
channel.description: Recent content in Flutter on ALiAS Writes

item.title: Getting Started With Flutter
item.description: Flutter is Googleâ€™s portable UI toolkit for building beautiful, natively-compiled applications for mobile, web, and desktop from a single codebase. More on Flutter… According to me, Flutter has a very bright future ahead as Google is using Flutter for the development of their own apps. It has very expressive and Flexible UI and it is famous for its Native Performance. The main challenge is that cross-platform development can be problematic. In recent years we have seen the emergence of various mobile frameworks like React Native and AngularJS that help make it easier for the developers.
